title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE31001 3 - 0 - 0: 3 CreditsClassification of rocket motors and their distinctive features; Ideal nozzle theory; Departures from ideal conditions; Adiabatic flame temperature; Frozen and equilibrium flows; Heat transfer in rocket engines; Liquid propellant rocket motors and its design and performance; Solid propellant rocket motors and its design and performance; Combustion instability External ballistics Rocket testing.
